short.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,: Play Raft Wars - Unblocked & Free as a Chrome extension - Also can Play without Internet, try it now!

short.zh_CN: 作为Chrome扩展程序玩Raft Wars - Unblocked＆Free-也可以在没有互联网的情况下播放，立即尝试！
short.zh_TW: 玩Raft Wars-非阻擋且免費的Chrome擴充功能-也可以在沒有網路的情況下玩，立即試試吧！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Play more games on the top-left menu.

Embark on a watery adventure filled with fun and mischief with the Raft Wars Chrome Extension – now unblocked and completely free for you to dive into a world of water-filled excitement! 🚣‍♂️💦🕹️

The Raft Wars Chrome Extension invites you to join the dynamic duo of Simon and his brother as they defend their treasure against rivals on the high seas, all without any restrictions. It's unblocked and ready for you to enjoy the splashing action at no cost. 🚫🔓

Challenge opponents, upgrade your weaponry, and master the art of aiming as you engage in epic water battles. Whether you're a skilled marksman or a casual gamer seeking water-themed fun, this extension promises hours of unadulterated entertainment, completely free of charge! 🎉🌐 Install now and set sail with the Raft Wars Chrome Extension – where every splash is a step closer to aquatic victory. 🚀💎 #RaftWars #ChromeExtension #Unblocked #FreeToPlay
